snippet: The state should follow a proven path to clearing out its overcrowded prisons and permanently fix its penal system.
abstract: Editorial contends California should move quickly to set up a sentencing commission that would recommend systemic, evidence-based and tested reforms; maintains reforms would reduce the prison population and also prevent prisoners from returning to prison after they are released.
lead_paragraph: The state should follow a proven path to clearing out its overcrowded prisons and permanently fix its penal system.
